greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of compositions of n such that the number of parts and the greatest part are not coprime.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..250
maple: b:= proc(n, t, g) option remember;
mathematica: b[n_, t_, g_] :=  b[n, t, g] = If[n == 0, If[GCD[g, t] != 1, 1, 0], Sum[b[n-i, t+1, Max[i, g]], {i, 1, n}]]; a[n_] := b[n, 0, 0]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 40}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 05 2014, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 11 2011
